attributes.action: Minute silence for all young people lost to youth violence on May 1st at 12pm
attributes.additional_details: Last year, at Richmond Terrace (Downing Street), we held our first minute silence and we recieved great amount of support from communities all around England. Www.oneminuteinmay.org
attributes.background: We have lost far too many young people to youth violence and we are all trying to put a stop to it, however at the same time we want to remember the ones we have lost by holding a minute silence on May 1st 12pm. This is a day of remebarance for our young people across UK.
